page.title: 02Hewelsfield Midsummer Fayre
page.content: On Saturday 22nd June 1985 Hewelsfield church had a Midsummer Fayre.The { {Forest of Dean Morris Dancers}were there to entertain the people. In a field there were the following {stalls and {games}:Merry go round,lucky dip,plant stall,treasure hunt,guess the weight of the dog,white elephant and bowls.In the church there was a craft exhibition of cane work,wool craft,wood work,pottery,lace work, patch work and flower arranging. There was also wood work by the local carpenter.There was a spinning demonstration in the vestry .The {Town Crier}was there in his costume and with his bell.The Hewelsfield {Town Criers }have been around for{500 hundred} years.The weather was drizzly and wet.
